decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Planning and Design access statement; 2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.13 Rev:0 (Existing Layout); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.11 Rev:0 (Existing First Floor Plan); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.10 Rev:0 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.16 Rev:0 (Existing Sections); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.14 Rev:0 (Existing Sections); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.12 Rev:0 (Existing Roof Plan);  2-Chrc.Grdn/Svy.15 Rev:0 (Existing Sections);  2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.23 Rev:0 (Proposed Sections);  2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.21 Rev:0 (Proposed First Floor Plan);  2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.20 Rev:0 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan);  2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.26 Rev:0 (Proposed Sections); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.24 Rev:0 (Proposed Elevations); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.22 Rev:0 (Proposed Roof Plan); 2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.25 Rev:0 (Proposed Sections);2-Chrc.Grdn/Prop.300 Rev:0 (Proposed Site Plan);

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Two-storey side extension, incorporating the creation of a bay window with a roof dome; alteration of the roof type; fenestration on the side elevation and raise height of outrigger.
